virtualObjectInfo.inertia: relatively heavy with the center of mass concentrated at one end
virtualObjectInfo.hapticFeedback: Users grip the round handle, sensing a smooth cylindrical shaft about 2–3 cm in diameter. A real metal–wood hammer or weighted training hammer with a heavy head and round wooden or rubber handle gives the correct heft distribution and handle feel.
